name: Viking Weapon Familiarity
summary: From childhood, you have been exposed to traditional viking weapons, and you soon learned to handle them in battle.
description:
From childhood, you have been exposed to traditional viking weapons, and you soon learned to handle them in battle. Now, you can raid proudly alongside your fellows. You are trained with the battle axe, hatchet, longsword, and shortsword. In addition, you gain the Shield Block reaction.Viking Weapon Familiarity Leads To...

Viking Weapon SpecialistTraitsArchetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
